reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Association of Self-governments Euroregion Carpathians - Ukraine - Carpathian network for local communities? development support

description.narrative: The immediate objective of the project is the development of the potential communities' capacity to address local problems by means of establishing effective cooperation between citizens government institutions local self-governments non-governmental organ izations and business in order to improve the living standards of vulnerable groups and equal access to public services.The specific objective of the project is to create favorable environment for sustainable socio-economic development at the local level t rhough communities' self-organization setting up their cooperation with local authorities and implementing communities' initiatives in selected communities of Ivano-Frankovsk Lviv and Transcarpathians regions.
